message: Suggestion: replace the (X) delete message button with a Reply button on hover;  it doesn't make (much*) sense to reply to yourself and it doesn't apply to have the delete button on messages that are  not your own.
* on the odd occasion you _really_ want to reply to yourself, nothing stops you from just plain writing @yourself.
I think it'd benefit a lot from a solution wherein the stars and the reply link don't interfere with one another
